synopsis.text: Samsara Studio and Nice Boat Animation bring you an original anime series that follows the journey of a chosen hero in a world where legends come to life. According to ancient lore, monsters possess the power to bestow control over the five elements upon select individuals. However, to attain this extraordinary ability, one must traverse the treacherous, fog-laden mountains. Join our protagonist as they embark on this perilous adventure, with the first three episodes set to release in 2020. Due to the studio's modest size, expect irregular updates in this thrilling saga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
